name: The Cyclops' Left Eye
data: It increases the users strength a good amount.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It decreases the users intelligence unbelievably much.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It decreases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
